name: NEW floating circles necklace
description:
floating circles necklace. 

dreamy jumble of light circles hang from an oxidized sterling silver chain. available in mixed metals (as shown) or all silver or all gold. 

each circle is forged and hammered by hand, brushed to a matte finish, and finished with our signature wire wrapping. 

chain measures 18 in.

name: gold stems necklace
description:
simple and graceful. six handforged and hammered gold stems hang delicately from an ecofriendly sterling silver chain. the chain has a beautiful dark patina.

measures 17 in. 

all items come beautifully wrapped and ready for gift giving.

name: geometrics cluster necklace
description:
circle triangle square. a lovely cluster of geometric shapes. 

three petite pendants are strung on a silver chain. each gold shape is formed and hammered by hand, and brushed to a matte finish. gold fill and sterling silver. measures 18 in. 

handmade in the USA. ripegoods is committed to reducing it's carbon footprint. currently 100% of silver wire is recycled, and at least 50% of other materials are reclaimed/recycled.

name: orbit necklace
description:
elemental circles lost in orbit. two gold circles necklace. 

gold circles exude warmth, and are set off by a sterling chain with an antique patina. hand hammered two gold circles necklace is closed with detailed silver wire. gold fill and sterling silver. measures 18 in. oxidized sterling silver chain.  

makes a beautiful love necklace for her. 

handmade in the USA. ripegoods is committed to reducing it's carbon footprint. currently 100% of silver wire is recycled, and at least 50% of other materials are reclaimed/recycled.

name: geometrics necklaces
description:
triangle. square. circle. elemental and architectural. 

choose the circle necklace, triangle necklace, or square necklace. understated. simple geometric shapes rest on the collarbone. each gold circle necklace, triangle necklace, and square necklace is made by hand and finished with detailed sterling wire wrapping. gold fill and sterling silver. oxidized sterling silver chain measures 15 in. 

handmade in the USA. ripegoods is committed to reducing it's carbon footprint. currently 100% of silver wire is recycled, and at least 50% of other materials are reclaimed/recycled.

name: silver stem earrings
description:
a graceful pair of earrings for night or day. 

structure complemented by movement. hammered sterling silver stems have a brushed finish and hang from oxidized sterling silver earwires. measures 2 in at longest point.

handmade in the USA. ripegoods is committed to reducing it's carbon footprint. currently 100% of silver wire is recycled, and at least 50% of other materials are reclaimed/recycled.

name: NEW large orbit necklace
description:
bohemian and whimsical circle necklaces. 

two hand hammered circles flow loosely on an oxidized sterling silver chain. choose from brushed gold or silver. 

18 in.

description:

gold filled wire is hand forged and hammered to form a beautiful arc. subtle sterling silver detailing. hangs from ecofriendly sterling silver chain that has an antique patina. 

necklace measures approx. 18.5 in. 

handmade in the USA. ripegoods is committed to reducing it's carbon footprint. currently 100% of silver wire is recycled, and at least 50% of other materials are reclaimed/recycled.

description:
whimsical and bohemian silver hoop earrings. 

hammered sterling silver circles are brushed to a matte finish. large silver hoop earrings move freely from oxidized silver earwires. 

handmade in the USA. ripegoods is committed to reducing it's carbon footprint. currently 100% of silver wire is recycled, and at least 50% of other materials are reclaimed/recycled.

name: lucky horseshoe necklace
description: gold horseshoe necklace is a classic. handcrafted gold fill horseshoe is hammered and brushed to a matte finish, affixed to an oxidized sterling silver chain. organic and one of a kind. lucky charm necklace is a great bridesmaid gift or friendship necklace. choose from medium horseshoe necklace on 18 in. chain or small horseshoe on 16 in. chain. we love this necklace paired with the white topaz solitaire.

name: titanium pyrite dangle earrings
description:
earthy luxury.

organically faceted pyrite stones have the look of black diamonds. each is completely unique, and a select few are stacked and dangle from oxidized sterling silver chain and earwires. sterling silver, titanium pyrite.

handmade in the USA. ripegoods is committed to reducing it's carbon footprint. currently 100% of silver wire is recycled, and at least 50% of other materials are reclaimed/recycled.

name: gold orbit earrings
description:
whimsical and bohemian hoop earrings. 

hammered gold fill circles are brushed to a matte finish and move freely from oxidized silver earwires. 

handmade in the USA. ripegoods is committed to reducing it's carbon footprint. currently 100% of silver wire is recycled, and at least 50% of other materials are reclaimed/recycled.

name: gold stem earrings
description:
these gold dangle earrings are a graceful pair for night or day. 

structure complemented by movement. hammered gold stems hang from oxidized sterling silver earwires. gold fill, sterling silver. measures 2 in at longest point.

handmade in the USA. ripegoods is committed to reducing it's carbon footprint. currently 100% of silver wire is recycled, and at least 50% of other materials are reclaimed/recycled.

name: pyrite petal earrings
description:
shimmer and shine.

earthy raw pyrite is married with feminine petal shaped earwires. each stone glimmers with interesting crevices and shapes, wrapped with recycled sterling silver and then organically oxidized. size + shape of stones will vary slightly. earrings hang approx. 2 in. from ear.

name: sky necklace
description:
Rustic, oxidized, organic. This "Y" shaped necklace features a wirewrapped swarovski crystal pendant. The dark patina sets off the clarity of the crystal, and dual draping of sterling chain accentuates the feminine and modern feel of the piece.   

All findings are sterling silver and oxidized without any chemicals.

Necklace measures approx. 18 in on outer chain, 16 on inner chain. lobster clasp.

name: luminosity necklace
description:
hidden depth. 

a smooth, circle rutilated quartz stone is accented with slivers of amber colored lines. suspended from a sterling silver chain with a beautiful patina. each stone has beautiful, unique variations. oxidized sterling silver chain measures 16 in., quartz is approx. 10mm.

name: antiqued petal earrings - white topaz
description:
earthy and elegant. recycled sterling silver is wrapped around teardrop briolettes and hang from lovely petal shaped earwires. antiqued patina adds dimension and highlights beautiful white topaz gemstones. 

earrings hang 2 in. from ear

name: pearl petal earrings
description:
simple. delicate. classic. 

organic round freshwater pearls hang from petal shaped sterling silver earwires. each pearl is unique with a pretty luster and perfectly partnered with the dark patina of the ecofriendly silver. these earrings hang about 2 in. 

your earrings are made to order and one of a kind so may have unique characteristics but will look similar to picture. all items come beautifully wrapped and ready for gift giving. 

we use at least 50% recycled/reclaimed metals in our creations and are committed to using locally sourced and ecofriendly materials and packaging.

name: rain drop hoop earrings -  gold
description:
large gold hoop earrings are light as rain drops. 

handforged gold fill wire is hammered and brushed to a matte finish. the raindrop shape is modern and classic, making these large gold hoop earrings perfect for everyday. ecofriendly made in the USA sterling silver ear wires and wrapping. 

handmade in the USA. ripegoods is committed to reducing it's carbon footprint. currently 100% of silver wire is recycled, and at least 50% of other materials are reclaimed/recycled.

name: distressed hammered circle dangle earrings
description:
a romantic and rustic pair of hammered and hand forged copper circles dangle from silver chain with an antique patina. sterling silver french earwire.

earrings hang about 2 in. from ear.

name: rain drop hoop earrings - silver
description:
light as rain drop earrings. 

handforged sterling silver wire is hammered and brushed to a matte finish. ecofriendly made in the USA sterling silver ear wires and wrapping. oxidized accent wire.  

handmade in the USA. ripegoods is committed to reducing it's carbon footprint. currently 100% of silver wire is recycled, and at least 50% of other materials are reclaimed/recycled.

name: waterfalls necklace
description:
a whimsical cascade of oxidized silver chains hang from hand forged copper circles. links are interwoven with matte gray sterling silver. raw and delicate.

ecofriendly made in the USA sterling silver chain measures 16 in.

name: asymmetrical peony necklace - small
description:
an earthy and inspired rustic peony necklace. organically shaped oxidized copper is complemented by an off center pearl.  Botanical and romantic shape is anchored by a supple brown leather cord and finished with a handforged copper S clasp. patina will evolve over time adding to the uniqueness of your piece. offered in small and large size pendants. 

Measurements: Copper pendant hangs from 16" cord, can customize length.
Materials: Copper, brass, sterling, freshwater pearl, leather cord
Shipping: All items are shipped USPS Priority Mail in signature ripegoods packaging ready to gift.
Notes: Each item is crafted by hand and made to order. This necklace  will have unique variations adding to the charm of your one of a kind piece but will look similar to picture.

name: twilight necklace
description:
twi·light Noun/ˈtwīˌlīt/
1. The soft glowing light from the sky when the sun is below the horizon, caused by the reflection of the sun's rays from the atmosphere.
2. The period of the evening during which this takes place, between daylight and darkness. 

the twilight necklace is inspired by late summer's warm light. matte gold is shaped and hammered into the shape of sun on the horizon. a floating, graceful design. 

necklace measures 18 in., pendant hangs from ecofriendly sterling silver chain that has an antiqued patina. 

each necklace is crafted by hand and one of a kind and will have unique variations but look similar to photos. 

all items come beautifully packaged and ready for gift giving.

name: waterfalls earrings
description:
a whimsical cascade of oxidized silver chains hang from hand forged copper circles. links are interwoven with matte gray sterling silver wire. raw and delicate.

ecofriendly made in the USA sterling silver chains.

all jewelry will arrive beautifully wrapped and ready for gift giving.

name: petite clusters necklace
description:
a cluster of dark copper handforged and hammered circles. geometric shaped mingle and mix. feminine and rustic. recycled sterling silver wire and chain that has been oxidized to a matte gray finish. 

measures 18 in.

name: leather + pearl wrap cuff
description:
a new kind of cuff. natural and statement making. 

supple brown upcycled leather is threaded with a leather cord and 
spectacular freshwater pearls that wrap a few times around your wrist. measures approx. 2 in. wide, and is adjustable to 7 in. 

each bracelet is made to order and will look similar to photos but have unique variations due to the nature of leather.

handcrafted in the USA. ripegoods is committed to reducing it's carbon footprint. currently 100% of silver wire is recycled, and at least 50% of other materials are reclaimed/recycled.

name: raw pearl solitaire necklace
description:
rustic and simple. raw pearl on antiqued silver chain. a beautiful juxtaposition of modern shapes and natural forms. 

each stone is unique, but will be similar to one pictured. necklace measures 18 in. 

we use at least 50% recycled and reclaimed silver in our creations. all purchases come gift ready in signature ripegoods packaging.

name: distressed three circles necklace
description:
industrial feminine chic. organically linked hand forged circles are fluid and light.  patina of the copper will change over time, adding to the uniqueness of your piece. each circle is hammered and wrapped with recycled silver wire and one of a kind. 

oxidized sterling silver chain. 

measures 17 in.

name: love necklace
description:
Organic mixed metals.  Ecofriendly brass pendants meet their match with a sterling eternity circle drop. Perfect for everyday wear, a rustic and delicate classic. 

A sterling circle is hand hammered, and then strung onto a feminine brass chain. We combined natural brass rectangle and circle pendants with sterling to create this understated and timeless piece of jewelry.     

The love necklace is a perfect gift for your sweetheart, best friend, mother, daughter, or yourself!

Measurements: Necklace measures 16”, rear clasp. Circle pendant just under 1” (25mm), rectangle 1.75” x .8” (32mm). sterling circle .5” round
Materials: Natural Brass (nickel free and lead free compliant) ecofriendly and made in the USA, sterling silver 
Care: the antiqued tarnish is achieved through a special process. If you attempt to clean with a cloth or chemicals, you may remove the dark finish. 
Shipping; We ship all items USPS Priority Mail in signature eco-friendly ripegoods packaging ready for gift-giving. 

Notes: Each item is custom made and will have unique qualities adding to its charm but will look similar to picture.  Enjoy your custom necklace ☺

name: yoga bracelet - oval
description:
Perfect for your practice or everyday wear. Designed to fit snugly and comfortably, we have tied chocolate brown cotton cord to a hammered sterling oval, and finished the bracelet with sterling clasp.

The sterling has been oxidized by an organic method, then polished just enough to give the piece a rustic, natural feel. We named this the yoga bracelet after our desire for a piece of jewelry that wouldn't distract us, still be pretty on or off the mat, and inspire peace and balance. This bracelet would make a great gift for the yoga lover, fitness enthusiast, or yourself!

Measures approx. 6.5". 

Your bracelet will arrive gift ready in signature ripegoods packaging.

name: antiqued solitaire necklace - white topaz
description:
organic sparkle. a white topaz teardrop briolette is strung on an oxidized sterling silver chain. rustic and feminine. perfect for everyday, and layered with other pieces. recycled sterling is ecofriendly.

measures 16 in. 

your necklace will arrive in signature ripegoods packaging and ready to gift.

name: the cuff by ripegoods - brown leather and pearl
description:
A new classic. Distressed brown leather is simple and soft. Pearl closure is an unexpected and perfect finishing touch.  

We upcycled found leather into this gorgeous bracelet. Vintage soft leather is cut by hand into the perfect cuff, and then finished off with a pearl closure fashioned with sterling silver wire.  Designed to fit snugly, your cuff will get softer with wear.

Each cuff is made to order and will look similar to photo but will have unique variations adding to the charm of your one of a kind piece. 


Measurements: Approx. 2 ½ in wide, Length 6 1/2 in, custom by request.  
Materials: upcycled brown leather, freshwater pearl, brass
Shipping; We ship all items USPS Priority Mail in signature eco-friendly ripegoods packaging ready for gift-giving. 
Notes: We are committed to using local and sustainable products. All leather upcycled and/or made in USA.

name: the mama necklace - custom handstamped pendants
description: earthy and delicate. an understated personalized necklace. as seen on daily candy. two custom stamped brass pendants in various shapes hang from a feminine chain, and are accented by a small stone drop. Freshwater pearls and garnet gemstones make it cool and classic. We have handstamped a simple initial on the natural brass rectangle pendant. Industrial meets chic with pretty drops we wirewrapped to the charms. Addt’l single initial pendants are available. Standard option comes with 1 initial. To include more initials/birthday, please select from additional custom options below. Measurements: Necklace measures 16”, rear clasp. Circle pendant just under 1” (25mm), rectangle 1.75” x .8” (32mm). garnet 5mm round. Materials: Natural Brass (nickel free and lead free compliant) ecofriendly and made in the USA, freshwater pearls, garnet gemstone. Care: the antiqued tarnish is achieved through a special process. If you attempt to clean with a cloth or chemicals, you may remove the dark finish. over time, the natural patina may change. to keep the vintage appearance, we recommend storing in open air, and cleaning with mild and soap and water when necessary. Shipping; We ship all items USPS Priority Mail in signature eco-friendly ripegoods packaging ready for gift-giving. Notes: Each item is custom made and will have unique qualities adding to its charm but will look similar to picture. Enjoy your custom heirloom necklace ☺ During paypal checkout, in notes to seller, please be sure to indicate: 1) initial for rectangle pendant 2) date for circular disc (will be in format of month.date.year ex: 3.16.10 OR just year ex: 2009)
